import styles from"./BillingDetailForm.module.css";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{useRef}from"react";import{cartActions}from"../../store/cartSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BillingDetailForm=()=>{// Các hook cần cho việc submit form
const dispatch=useDispatch();const nameRef=useRef();const emailRef=useRef();const phoneRef=useRef();const addressRef=useRef();// Lấy listCart từ redux để tính tổng số tiền để submit form
const listCart=useSelector(state=>state.cart.listCart);const total=Number(listCart.reduce((total,cart)=>total+cart.total,0));// Hàm submit form : Khi submit thì sẽ alert ra thông tin người mua và tổng số tiền
const submitHandler=event=>{event.preventDefault();const billingDetail={name:nameRef.current.value,email:emailRef.current.value,phone:phoneRef.current.value,address:addressRef.current.value,total:total};window.alert("Your order is done : 
Name : ".concat(billingDetail.name," 
Email : ").concat(billingDetail.email," 
Phone : ").concat(billingDetail.phone," 
Address : ").concat(billingDetail.address," 
Total : ").concat(billingDetail.total));// Xóa các trường thông tin và xóa listCart trong redux
nameRef.current.value="";emailRef.current.value="";phoneRef.current.value="";addressRef.current.value="";dispatch(cartActions.deleteAllCart());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-fill",onSubmit:submitHandler,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"pt-3",children:"Billing details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{method:"post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group pt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"pb-2",children:"Full name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",ref:nameRef,className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Your Fullname Here!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group pt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"pb-2",children:"Email: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",ref:emailRef,className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Your Email Here!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group pt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"pb-2",children:"Phone number:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",ref:phoneRef,className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Your Phone Number Here!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group pt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"pb-2",children:"Address:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",ref:addressRef,className:"form-control",placeholder:"Enter Your Address Here!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles["btn-bill"],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"my-4 w-100 btn",children:"Place order"})})]})]})});};export default BillingDetailForm;
